description:
One of Mitsuki Rara`s best friends. While initially teasing Mitsuki for her attraction to Kazuki, they help him escape the Rara base when his identity is revealed. Later, they give Kazuki her diary after a battle, letting him know Mitsuki`s still thinking about him. The three later join Mitsuki Rara as pilots for the EDF.
When Zinv is destroyed and the worlds merge, Alice, Mena and Ryla return to working for the Raras.
name: Ryla Phoenix
